Package pepse.world

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • danogl.GameObject
      • pepse.world.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemovableBlock
    public class Block
extends danogl.GameObject
    Represents a single block (larger objects can be created from blocks).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block​(danogl.util.Vector2 topLeftCorner,
             danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable renderable)
        Constructor. Construct a new GameObject instance.
        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - Position of the object, in window coordinates (pixels). Note that (0,0) is the top-left corner of the window.
        renderable - The renderable representing the object. Can be null, in which case
